lead_paragraph: FOSTER--Madeleine McHugh Andres, age 93, formerly of Eastchester and New Rochelle, the beloved wife of the late John Joseph Andres and the late Vincent F. "Bud" Foster, passed away peacefully on Sunday, January 10, 2016. Madeleine is survived by her four loving children, Stephen, Patricia "Tisha," Robert and John; stepchildren, Michael, Cathleen and Nicholas; numerous grandchildren, great-grand-children, and nieces and nephews. Friends are invited to attend a Memorial Mass on Friday, February 12, 2016 at 9:30am, directly at the Immaculate Conception Church in Tuckahoe, NY. Interment will follow in Holy Mount Cemetery in Eastchester. Memorial donations may be made in her name to The Jewish Home for the Elderly, 175 Jefferson Street, Fairfield, CT 06825. To send an online condolence and to view the full obituary, please visit www.shaughnesseybanks. com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FOSTER, MADELEINE MCHUGH ANDRES
